newsitem.title: USA: PacifiCare to mull Fla. business options.
newsitem.headline: PacifiCare to mull Fla. business options.

text.p: PacifiCare Health Systems Inc said Friday it is exploring options for its business operations in Florida, including a possible sale.
"At this time, no definitive decision has been made and until such time, the company will continue to operate in the Florida marketplace," the company said.
PacifiCare said its plan to buy FHP International Corp will require it to focus on FHP-related matters, such as the integration of the two companies.
The company said the merger presents it with new opportunities in the West and Southwest.
Dillon, Read & Co, which worked on the FHP deal, is acting as a financial advisor.
PacifiCare of Florida, established in 1994 through the acquisition of two health plans, has about 51,000 members.
PacifiCare Health has operations serving two million members in California, Florida, Oklahoma, Oregon, Texas, and Washington.
